Home » Texas Insurance Claim Lawyers

# Texas Insurance Claim Lawyers

It is your legal right to pursue an insurance claim in the event of an
unforeseen accident. We would all like to believe that insurance companies
have our best interests at heart, but unfair insurance practices are all too
common. It is important to remember that insurance companies often try to
minimize the amount of compensation you deserve. Keep in mind that payments
reduce the cash reserves that insurance companies must keep. Maintaining those
cash reserves costs the insurer money and can only be done by reducing profit
or increasing premiums.

At Roberts & Roberts, we provide the legal counsel necessary for you to fully
understand your legal rights under your insurance policy. Whether it is a car
accident insurance claim or homeowner’s insurance claim, our insurance claims
attorneys are experienced, knowledgeable, and willing to provide you with the
knowledge you need to get the most out of your claim.

If you have made a claim under an insurance policy and the insurance company
is not being fair, you are going to need legal help. An experienced personal
injury attorney on the staff of Roberts & Roberts will fight for you when an
insurance company refuses your valid claim and impinges your legal rights

Contact us at 903-597-6000. The call costs you nothing … it could mean
everything. All calls are answered 24 hours a day, seven days a week. We will
come to you if you are disabled. You can also use our online contact form.

## Free Case Review

You have nothing to lose by letting our attorneys advise you of your options.
For a **no-cost, confidential attorney** review of your case, contact us using

Home » Our Fees

# Our Fees

At Roberts & Roberts, our Texas personal injury lawyers understand that many
accident victims may be concerned about the fees of hiring an attorney. We
never want money worries to prevent injured people from getting the justice
they deserve. That’s why we offer our clients a range of options when it comes
to attorney’s fees.

While some clients prefer to pay an hourly fee or a flat fee, the vast
majority of our clients with personal injury and wrongful death cases find
that a contingency-fee (percentage) plan suits their needs best.

One of the main benefits of a contingency fee is that you, our client, don’t
have to pay us anything up front. In fact, at Roberts & Roberts, you pay us
nothing under a contingency-fee plan unless and until we recover compensation
for you on your claim. You will not owe us anything for attorney’s fees, court
costs, or other legal expenses unless you are compensated.

When you choose a contingency fee, the cost of your legal representation will
be paid out of your compensation based on a percentage that we agree on when
you become our client. This means that you do not have to worry about paying
legal bills while your case is pending. At Roberts & Roberts, we don’t get
paid until you do.

Our attorneys will be glad to discuss with you in detail how contingent fees
work. We want to put your mind at ease about the financial aspects of your
claim. Your focus should be on recovering from your injuries or loss and
putting your life back together.

Find out how our Texas accident lawyers can help you. Contact us today at
**903-597-6000 ** **** or fill out our online contact form. There is no charge
for the initial review.

Most of the attorneys at Roberts & Roberts are board certified by the Texas
Board of Legal Specialization in personal injury law or civil trial law. We
are proud of the extraordinarily high percentage of our current clients who
were recommended to us by our former clients. Call us. We can help.

The call costs you nothing … It could mean everything.
